articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station Near Completion
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station Near Completion
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the construction site of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station near completion.
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, and Jo Yong Won, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Kim Jong Un shook hands with commanding officers of the shock-brigade one by one, saying that the dam project of Power Station No. 1 was completed on the occasion of August 28, the Youth Day, a fresh miracle in the worksites of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The young people of the DPRK are very admirable as they have waged a high-pitched drive day and night for the past more than 120 days since he visited the construction site in April to create world-startling heroic myth of youth, he noted, adding that it could be created only by the young people of the DPRK educated and trained under the care of the WPK and all of them are heroes. He reposed the deepest trust in them by naming the power station the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station.
					
					 Watching the monuments to the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before looking round the education room under construction, he stressed that the feats performed by the young people in the construction of the power station are the precious treasure to be specially recorded in the WPK's history and handed down to posterity. He named the room the Exhibition of Feats of Paektusan Heroic Young People.
					
					 He went round dams of stations No. 1 and 2, waterway tunnel, generator room, control room and transformer substation of station No. 2 and other places to learn about the construction in detail.
					
					 He watched the high dam of station No. 1 from various places and walked along it, saying that the dam looks majestic and splendid. When looking up to the dam, one feels as if watching the sky-high spirit of the young people in the DPRK and when feasting one's eyes on it from distance, one feels as if watching a huge unit of young people forming a human fortress and shield protecting the Party Central Committee, he stressed.
					
					 Whoever stands on the dam of the power station would feel poetic sentiment flash upon one's mind, he said, noting with pleasure that this represents the heroic spirit and feats of the young people of Paektu who dash ahead like the wind along the course of the Korean revolution set by the WPK in the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.
					
					 One cannot watch the dam and waterway tunnel of station No. 2 casually, he said, adding that one has to pay tribute to the patriotism displayed by young people in conquering nature despite biting cold.
					
					 Noting that its generator room and control room and the transformer substation were built well, he gave an instruction to have their trial operation at an early date as equipment have been assembled and establish an integrated control system put on a high automation and IT basis so as to keep the operation of stations No. 1 and 2 on normal footing.
					
					 He stressed that the workers of various industrial establishments including the Taean Heavy Machine Complex made a lot of efforts for the construction of the power station. He extended thanks to them for performing labor feats in producing and ensuring custom-built equipment.
					
					 He watched with satisfaction the transmission towers and lines stretching to Samjiyong County from the power station before looking round the dwelling houses built by soldier-builders for the people who were evacuated from the inundated area.
					
					 He said that there are so many monumental edifices going by the name of youth on this land, adding with pride that this proves the 70-year long history of the WPK is characterized by the history of attaching importance to youth and bringing up the young people to be heroes of the times and masters of creation.
					
					 The construction of the power station eloquently proved once again that the decision of the party precisely means reality and practice and the young people of the DPRK are performing the role of vanguard in implementing the party's decisions, he noted, emphasizing their might is tremendous, indeed.
					
					 It is the consistent strategic line of the WPK to train the young people as masters of the times and encourage them to enter the gate of the thriving nation before anyone else, he said, underscoring the need for all young people to build on this land more structures of eternal value to be handed down to posterity by carrying forward the proud tradition of young Koreans.
					
					 He called on them to wind up the project perfectly as not many days are left before the 70th birthday of the WPK and stage a grand young soldier-people chorus, a declaration of victors, there. He promised to watch it without fail and have pictures taken with them against the background of the dam of station No. 1 that day.
					
					 He watched the performance "Song of faith sung by young people in Paektu" given by the itinerant art squad of the power station and had a photo session with its members.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Intellectuals
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Intellectuals
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent the 80th birthday spread to Han Ki Bom, teacher at Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering, and the 70th birthday spread to Kim Song Gun, artist of the Korean Industrial Art Information Exchange Agency.
					 Han Ki Bom wrote books, reference books and papers making contributions to the development of the country's chemical industry and teaching for several decades and made positive efforts to training students as scientific and technological talents.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il helped him receive titles of merited scientist, professor and doctor and showed loving care for him so that he was awarded high state commendations.
					
					 Kim Song Gun created famous art pieces of the era such as Korean painting "Wave of Sea Kumgang" listed as a national treasure, working for over four decades in the field of fine art.
					
					 Under the care of the peerlessly great men he became people's prize laureate, people's artiste and doctor.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from S. M. Mironov, chairman of the A Just Russia, on September 3.
					 The chairman in the message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to all the people of the DPRK on behalf of the A Just Russia and on his own behalf on the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 In the period over half a century the Korean people have achieved victories in building a developed socialist power, firmly maintaining the Juche idea under the guidance of the leaders of the nation, the message said.
					
					 It voiced expectation that the tasks set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea to build socialism in the DPRK in reliance on its own efforts would be accomplished.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and all the Korean people great labor successes.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of Liberal Democratic Party of Russia
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of Liberal Democratic Party of Russia
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from V. V. Zhirinovsky, chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, on September 9.
					 The message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to all the Korean people on behalf of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia and all the Russian people on the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 The founding of the DPRK was a historical event that opened a road for the independent development of the country, the message said.
					
					 Under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea the DPRK has achieved great successes in all fields of people's life, it noted.
					
					 Recently Russia and the DPRK have positively developed the bilateral relations on the basis of the rich experience gained in the past period in cooperation for strengthening the good-neighborly and friendly relations and achieving peace, it said.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un and the citizens of the DPRK progress on the road for building a socialist nation.

articles.title: NADA Director on Successes in Outer Space Development
articles.content:
NADA Director on Successes in Outer Space Development
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The director of the National Aerospace Development Administration (NADA) of the DPRK was interviewed by KCNA Monday as regards the achievements made by its scientists and technicians in the field of outer space development on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 He said:
					
					 The field of outer space development is also registering shining achievements like all other fields this year.
					
					 The NADA is pushing forward at a final phase the development of a new earth observation satellite for weather forecast, etc. positively conducive to the development of the nation's economy and made big progress in the research into the geostationary satellite, a new higher stage in the development of satellite.
					
					 Successful progress made in reconstructing and expanding satellite launching grounds for higher-level satellite lift-off has laid a firm foundation for dynamically pushing ahead with the nation's development of space science.
					
					  Space development has become a worldwide trend and many countries are manufacturing and launching satellites for various purposes including communication, global positioning, crop estimate, metrological observation and resource prospecting.
					
					 The DPRK's satellite launch is also a peaceful project, pursuant to its sci-tech development plan for building an economic power and improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 Space development for peaceful purposes is a sovereign state's legitimate right recognized by international law and the Party and the people of the DPRK are fully determined to exercise this right no matter what others may say about it.
					
					 The world will clearly see a series of satellites of Songun Korea soaring into the sky at the times and locations determined by the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Delegation of Myanmar Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Myanmar Here
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Myanmar led by Vice-Minister Thant Kyaw arrived here Monday.

articles.title: DPRK Public Health Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Public Health Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- A DPRK public health delegation led by Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health, came back home Monday after participating in the World Hepatitis Summit held in the U.K. and the 68th Session of the WHO Regional Committee for Southeast Asia held in East Timor.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifters Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifters Back Home
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifters came back home Monday after participating in the 2015 Asian Weightlifting Championship.
					 The players and coaches were greeted at Pyongyang Railway Station by Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, and officials concerned.

articles.title: World First Aid Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
World First Aid Day Marked in DPRK
						
 Phyongsong, September 14 (KCNA) -- An event to observe World First Aid Day was held in Phyongsong, South Phyongan Province Monday under the theme of "First Aid and Old Persons".
					 Present there were officials of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK, young RC members, volunteers and members of a delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and a delegation of the International Committee of the Red Cross working in the DPRK.
					
					 There took place a lecture related to the method of first aid with which old persons and schoolchildren can save people's lives at an emergency.
					
					 The participants enjoyed an art performance given by young RC members and talked to one another about Red Cross activities.

articles.title: Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm
articles.content:
Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm in the DPRK is in full swing of harvesting apples.
					 The bumper crop of fruits gives a glimpse of its bright future as a promising world's leading fruit farm.
					
					 Fruit culture of the farm has been put on a highly scientific and intensive basis to increase the effectiveness of manuring and cultivation and yield per hectare.
					
					 A nursery was successfully completed with the introduction of advanced technologies, which makes it possible to produce good breed of saplings. And the establishment of ring-shaped rotation production system reliably guarantees the systematic and radical growth of fruit production.

articles.title: By Our National Itself Is Idea of Unity and Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
By Our National Itself Is Idea of Unity and Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification by bringing about a great change in the inter-Korean relations, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has made positive efforts to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve the independent reunification from the stand of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 If the Korean nation fails to reject interference of outside forces in the issues of the nation and the inter-Korean relations from this stand, it can not achieve the reconciliation and unity and advance toward the peace and reunification.
					
					 Though there are difficult and complicated problems in the inter-Korean relations, invariable is the stand of the DPRK to achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity by making the great change in the inter-Korean relations in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The north and the south should respect and value as the idea common to the nation the idea of By Our Nation Itself which was clarified in the June 15 joint declaration and was reaffirmed in the October 4 declaration and uphold the idea as the banner of the struggle for improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving the independent reunification.
					
					 South Korea spreads the story that the results of the north-south high-level urgent contact was brought by "alliance" and "support" by outside forces. This is contrary to sincerity and efforts of compatriots to improve the inter-Korean relations and open up a broad avenue to independent reunification in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Outside forces who did not want the north-south reconciliation, unity and independent reunification were in the distress-torn history of the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 The master of improving the inter-Korean relations is the north and the south and the might of improving the relations and achieving the peace and reunification lies in the Korean nation itself.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' War Drills Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' War Drills Denounced 
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- South Korean warmongers frantically staged war drill for aggression against the north by mobilizing huge armed forces such as the three services and Marine Corps of the south Korean army together with U.S. imperialists' warships under the signboard of "reenactment of Inchon landing operation" from September 12. 
					 Earlier, the south Korean warmongers together with the U.S. staged "bio-defensive drill" at the "Institute for National Defense Studies," talking about "intentional bio-threat" and "boosting of mutual cooperation system." 
					
					 These are the desperate efforts to block the north-south dialogue and the improvement of the relations and escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula once again, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary. 
					
					 What the north and the south require at present is a bold practical act to raise the hard-won precious bud of national reconciliation, not the military provocation rattling the nerves of the dialogue partner and threatening it, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities are recklessly hurting the fellow countrymen in the north, begging outsiders cooperation for anti-north confrontation and staging war drills against the north, in disregard of the destiny of the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 The north-targeted war drills including the "reenactment of Inchon landing operation" are part of the anti-DPRK confrontation rackets being kicked up in south Korea recently. 
					
					 The reality requires all Koreans at home and abroad to heighten the vigilance against the disturbing forces' acts of obstructing the improvement of the north-south relations and decisively smash them by concerted efforts of the nation. 
					
					 The south Korean warmongers would be well advised to properly face up to the aspiration and wishes of all Koreans and behave themselves.

articles.title: "Diplomacy for Unification" Touted by S. Korean Chief Executive Denounced by S. Korean Media
articles.content:
"Diplomacy for Unification" Touted by S. Korean Chief Executive Denounced by S. Korean Media
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on September 8 posted an editorial denouncing the absurd "diplomacy for unification" touted by the south Korean chief executive. 
					 Referring to the fact that the present chief executive of south Korea cried out for "early unification" in a foreign country, the editorial went on:
					
					 Reunification of Korea is not the matter to be dealt with a foreign country but an issue to be settled with the north. 
					
					 It is a big mistake to calculate that big changes would take place on the Korean Peninsula thanks to a certain role of outside forces to bring reunification. 
					
					 The "diplomacy for unification" touted by the present regime is contrary to the great principle agreed upon by the south and the north so far. 
					
					 The south and the north of Korea agreed on the principle of reunification-- independence, peace and great national unity-- in the July 4 joint statement in 1972, the June 15 joint declaration in 2000 and the October 4 declaration in 2007. Reunification is the task to be carried out by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation and there is no other way for it.

articles.title: Halt to Moves to Conclude Military Agreement with Japan Demanded in South Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Moves to Conclude Military Agreement with Japan Demanded in South Korea
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, Solidarity for Progress, Confederation of Trade Unions and other organizations in south Korea held a joint press conference in Seoul on Sept. 11 in denunciation of the moves for the conclusion of the Japan-south Korea military agreement.
					 At the conference the organizations referred to the fact that vice- defence minister-level talks between south Korea and Japan were held in Seoul that day.
					
					 They disclosed that the talks will discuss the issues of concluding the military agreement such as the detailed procedures and methods for the dispatch of the Japan "Self-Defence Forces" to the Korean Peninsula, agreement on protecting military intelligence and agreement on mutual logistic support.
					
					 They held that the conclusion of the military agreement with Japan would bring nothing but only disturb peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They asserted that its conclusion is tantamount to providing an institutional condition for backing the SDF's reinvasion of the Korean Peninsula itself in the long run.
					
					 They urged the Defense Ministry to voice opposition to Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense," though belatedly, and immediately halt the discussion on the conclusion of the military agreement.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces Authorities' Unpopular Moves
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces Authorities' Unpopular Moves
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea released a statement on September 10 to denounce the authorities' moves to enforce the unpopular labor law.
					 The statement accused the present "government" of putting into practice a plan for making a retrogressive revision of the labor market structure at any cost.
					
					 If the present "government" enforces the revision plan at any cost, it will face a movement for forcing the regime to step down, the statement warned.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Celebrated by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Celebrated by Koreans in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia held a meeting on September 5 on the occasion of the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 Present there were Chairman Kim Chil Song and members of the confederation and other Koreans in Russia. 
					
					 Speakers said at the meeting that the greatest exploit performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the country and its people is that they founded a genuine country of the people. Korea, which eclipsed in the world map, has developed into a nuclear weapons state, he added. 
					
					 Then, Koreans in Russia, who took part in the meeting for national reunification to mark the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation, gave impressions of their visit to the homeland. 
					
					 Thanks to the tested leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un the looks of the homeland changed beyond recognition and the people are leading a happy life, they said. 
					
					 They expressed their will to join the people in the homeland in making a tangible contribution to the country in the efforts to build an economic power and hasten national reunification despite the persistent obstructive moves of outside forces. 
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Koreans in Uzbekistan Observe DPRK Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Koreans in Uzbekistan Observe DPRK Founding Anniversary
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Uzbekistan held an event at the DPRK embassy in Tashkent on September 9, the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Sok Myong Son, chairman of the International United Confederation of Koreans, Ju Yong Il, chairman of the "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan, and other officials of the United Confederation of Koreans in Uzbekistan, heads of the compatriot art troupes and compatriots.
					
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before a full-length painting portraying President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They went round photos documenting the revolutionary careers of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and revolutionary exploits of Marshal Kim Jong Un displayed at the embassy.
					
					 The participants watched a Korean film "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity".

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Il Sung's Work Held in Switzerland
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Il Sung's Work Held in Switzerland
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- A seminar on President Kim Il Sung's work "The Political Programme of the Government of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" was held by the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Sept. 5 on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK (September 9).
					 Martin Lotscher, chief of the above-said group, made a report which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers referred to the main contents of the work.
					
					 They said that the Korean people built the socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, meeting all challenges and foiling aggression moves by the imperialists, in order to fulfill the tasks set forth by Kim Il Sung in his work.
					
					 Socialist Korea is making a dynamic progress in building a thriving nation and implementing the cause of national reunification under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, they stressed.
					
					 They affirmed their resolution to widely introduce the just cause of the Korean people firmly rallied around Kim Jong Un and stage extensive activities for solidarity with the Korean people.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They included meetings, seminars, opening ceremony of Korean photo, book and handicraft exhibition, film shows and book exhibition in Mexico, Britain, Angola and Peru on Sept. 7 and 8.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, books and photos introducing the invincible might of Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Arms of Korea" and "Pyongyang Today."
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico said that Kim Il Sung defeated the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world in the Korean War and safeguarded the sovereignty and dignity of the country.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain and the chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy said that the 67 years covered by the DPRK are a history in which it made a drastic change in the Korean history and turned into a political and ideological power and a military power under the guidance of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and a history of victory in which it advanced under the banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows took place at companies of Nigeria, Thailand and Indonesia from Sept. 7 to 9 on the occasion of the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The participants watched Korean films "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation," "Songdowon International Children's Camp," "Masikryong Ski Resort" and "Korea Shining with Time-honored History".

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea Urged by Guinean Broadcasting Services
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea Urged by Guinean Broadcasting Services
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The Guinean broadcasting services bitterly denounced the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea on Sept. 9.
					 Its domestic broadcasting service said that the U.S. is chiefly to blame for the division of the Korean nation.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 In actuality, Korea which was under the occupation by the Japanese imperialists for more than four decades should have become a full-fledged independent sovereign state at the end of the Second World War in which Japan was defeated.
					
					 But the U.S., which has long eyed Korea as an important strategic vantage for dominating Asia and the world, unilaterally declared its occupation of the southern half of Korea with the 38th Parallel as a demarcation line and advanced its troops into south Korea under the mask of "liberators" on Sept. 8, 1945.
					
					 This divided Korea, neither war criminal state nor defeated nation, into the north and the south.
					
					 Peace and security on the Korean Peninsula are directly linked with those in Northeast Asia and the world.
					
					 The withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea would usher in a phase favorable for reunification of the Korean nation as well as peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The U.S. forces should quit south Korea at once.
					
					 The international broadcasting service of Guinea also aired a similar program.

articles.title: Solidarity Meeting with Korean People Held in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Solidarity Meeting with Korean People Held in Bangladesh
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- A meeting for solidarity with the Korean people took place in Dhaka on Sept. 8 under the sponsorship of the Bangladesh Community Party.
					 Present there were Chairman Mujahidul Islam Selim and the general secretary and other leadership members of the communist party and other people.
					
					 The meeting informed its participants of the news about the enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea guided by Comrade Kim Jong Un and the present situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 A message to the Korean people was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 The message said:
					
					 The large scale joint military drills staged by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities every year are a main factor of threatening peace and security not only on the Korean Peninsula and in the region but the rest of the world.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK at once, stop annual joint military drills and replace the present Armistice Agreement by a peace accord, extending militant solidarity to the government and people of the DPRK in their efforts to protect the social system chosen by them and their sovereignty.
					
					 We strongly demand the U.S. and the south Korean authorities value the agreement reached at the north-south high-level emergency contact and immediately stop acts contrary to its implementation.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Organization
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let the Women of the North and the South Unite and Hasten the Reunification of the Country" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on Sept. 7.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by British Organization
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Juche-Oriented Socialist State with Invincible Might" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on September 1.
					 The work, published on September 5, Juche 97 (2008), clarifies in detail that the invincible might of the DPRK lies in preserving and glorifying forever the Juche-oriented idea of President Kim Il Sung on nation-building and his exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Central Hidroelectrica Juventud Heroina Paektusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Central Hidroelectrica Juventud Heroina Paektusan
						
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea dirigio sobre el terreno el campo de construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud Heroina Paektusan en visperas de inauguracion.
					Le acompanaron el secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Choe Ryong Hae, y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won.
					
					El Mariscal apreto las manos a los miembros de mando de la brigada de construccion diciendo que en la zona del monte Paektu se ha creado un nuevo milagro por la finalizacion de la obra del dique de la Central no. 1 con motivo del 28 de agosto, Dia de la Juventud.
					
					Son bravos nuestros jovenes que crearon un mito heroico y asombroso de la juventud mediante la incansable campana de dia y noche durante mas de 120 dias desde cuando yo recorri el campo de construccion en abril pasado, dijo y agrego que este mito lo pueden crear solo los jovenes coreanos crecidos en el regazo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Afirmo que los jovenes coreanos son todos heroes y denomino la planta como la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud Heroina Paektusan. 
					
					Al recorrer el monumento a la historia revolucionaria de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu y la sala de educacion en construccion, subrayo que los meritos de los jovenes realizados en la construccion de esta planta constituyen patrimonios preciosos a ser transmitidos orgullosamente en la historia de nuestro partido y denomino la sala de educacion como Exposicion de Meritos de Juventud Heroina Paektusan.
					
					Luego, el Mariscal dio vueltas por los diques de las centrales no. 1 y no.2, y el tunel para el paso de agua, la sala de generadores, la de control, la subestacion de transformacion fuera del edificio, de la central no.2 y otros lugares, donde se entero en detalles de la construccion. 
					
					Contemplando en varios puntos el dique de la planta no. 1 y andando sobre el dique, dijo que es tan maravilloso, majestuoso y guapo y se parece ver el impetu de los jovenes coreanos y el aspecto del contingente juvenil que forma el baluarte de defensa al Comite Central del Partido. 
					
					A uno que se encuentra sobre el dique se le iluminara espontaneamente una inspiracion poetica, destaco y dijo con alegria, como si recitara una poesia, que los jovenes del Paektu con el impetu y meritos heroicos marchan a galopes por la orbita de la revolucion coreana fijada por el PTC poniendo de pleno manifiesto el espiritu del viento cortante del Paektu. 
					
					No se puede ver con indiferencia el dique y el tunel para el paso de agua de la central no. 2, dijo y rindio gracias al patriotismo de los jovenes que desarrollaron la guerra con la naturaleza en medio del frio intenso.
					
					Aprecio que se hayan construido bien la sala de generadores, la de control y la subestacion de transformacion fuera del edificio de la planta no. 2 y subrayo la necesidad de realizar cuanto antes el manejo de prueba de acuerdo con la terminacion de ajuste de equipos y establecer el sistema de control combinado que asegure el alto nivel automatico e informatico para poder gestionar normalmente las centrales no.1 y no.2. 
					
					Dio agradecimiento a los obreros del Complejo de Maquinaria Pesada de Taean y otras fabricas y empresas que realizaron meritos en la produccion de equipos pendientes. 
					
					Tras ver con satisfaccion las torres y lineas de transmision electrica extendidas desde la central hasta el distrito de Samjiyon, recorrio las nuevas viviendas construidas por los militares para los moradores de la zona anegada. 
					
					Dijo con orgullo que muchas creaciones monumentales erguidas en esta tierra se llaman con el nombre de la juventud, lo cual significa que en la historia de 70 anos del PTC esta impregnada la trayectoria del PTC que da importancia a la juventud y forma a los jovenes como heroes de la historia y maestros de creacion. 
					
					La construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud Heroina Paektusan evidencio de nuevo que la decision del Partido es precisamente la realidad y la practica y que los jovenes coreanos desempenan el papel de vanguardias en materializar la decision del Partido, senalo y enfatizo que es muy potente el poderio de nuestros jovenes.
					
					Subrayo que formar a los jovenes como duenos de la epoca para que ellos pongan primero la placa en la puerta de la potencia prospera es la linea y orientacion estrategicas del Partido y exhorto a todos los jovenes a levantar mucho mas patrimonios de la patria a ser legados de generacion en generacion continuando la tradicion orgullosa de la juventud coreana. 
					
					Dijo que ya estamos en visperas del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC y deben terminar perfectamente la obra y declarar la victoria en este lugar ejecutando magnificamente el gran coro juvenil del ejercito y el pueblo. Y comprometio que el mismo lo presenciara sin falta y tomara una foto de recuerdo con los constructores tomando como fondo el dique de la planta no.1.
					
					El Mariscal presencio la funcion del grupo de agitacion artistica movil de la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud Heroina Paektusan "Cancion de conviccion de la juventud del Paektu" y se fotografio junto con los miembros de este grupo artistico.

articles.title: Director de Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Espacial de RPDC se refiere a exitos
articles.content:
Director de Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Espacial de RPDC se refiere a exitos 
						
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ACNC) -- A una pregunta formulada por la ACNC con respecto a los exitos que logran los cientificos y tecnicos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el sector de desarrollo espacial en ocasion del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el director de Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Espacial de RPDC dio el dia 14 siguiente respuesta:
					Este ano, se logran los exitos orgullosos tambien en el sector de desarrollo espacial al igual que en todas las demas ramas.
					
					A fin de contribuir con teson al desarrollo economico del pais, nuestra Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Espacial acelera en etapa final el desarrollo del nuevo satelite de observacion de la Tierra para el pronostico del tiempo y otros propositos, y logro ya gran avance en la investigacion sobre el satelite estacionario, nueva etapa alta del desarrollo de satelites.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, se impulsaron con exito los trabajos para remodelar y ampliar los campos de lanzamiento para que puedan lanzar los satelites de nivel mas alto, con lo cual se prepara una firme base capaz de impulsar con vigor el desarrollo de ciencia espacial del pais.
					
					En la actualidad, el desarrollo del espacio constituye una tendencia mundial y muchos paises producen y lanzan los satelites con varios propositos inclusive la comunicacion y la orientacion, la calificacion del rendimiento de cosecha de los cultivos, la observacion meteorologica y la exploracion de recursos.
					
					El lanzamiento de nuestros satelites tambien constituye un trabajo pacifico adecuado al plan estatal de desarrollo de ciencias y tecnicas para la construccion de una potencia economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					El desarrollo pacifico del espacio es el derecho legitimo del Estado soberano, reconocido oficialmente por la ley internacional, nuestro Partido y pueblo tienen la decision invariable de ejercer dignamente este derecho.
					
					En lo adelante el mundo presenciara claramente los satelites de Corea del Songun que se lanzaran continua y altamente al cielo a la hora y en el lugar decididos por el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Distribuida declaracion de MINREX de RPDC como documento oficial de ONU
articles.content:
Distribuida declaracion de MINREX de RPDC como documento oficial de ONU
						
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Fue distribuida el dia 11 como documento oficial S/2015/689 del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU la declaracion del portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, publicada en ocasion del 70o aniversario de la ocupacion al suelo surcoreano de las tropas norteamericanas.
